description: soft cover book with text and two images (a man writing and bathers outdoors); brown cover with text
provenance: [Richard Reed Armstrong Fine Art, Chicago, until 2005; sold in April for PROO with two proofs of 4th state and one of the 1st state, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2005-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Banquet for Painter and Writer Auguste Lepère on His Promotion to the Rank of Officer in the Legion of Honor
